revised_title: Richard Bradley's Relationship with Sir Hans Sloane
tldr: This article explores the relationship between Richard Bradley, a prolific author of books on agriculture, horticulture, biology, and medicine, and Sir Hans Sloane, a prominent figure in science and medicine. The article sheds light on Bradley's life, his correspondence with Sloane, and their scientific activities during their time. It highlights the support and assistance Sloane provided to Bradley, as well as their occasional intellectual interactions.
